title: Cyber Hoodie Academy Student
description: Created a pixel art character for the Hoodie Academy! Used a limited 8-color palette with cel shading. The character has a cyberpunk aesthetic with neon green highlights and is wearing the signature hoodie. Set in the Academy's dojo with training equipment in the background.
author: PixelArtist123

title: Academy Meme Masterpiece
description: Made a meme about the recent market dip using the Drake format. Top text: 'Checking portfolio every 5 minutes', bottom text: 'Still checking portfolio every 5 minutes'. Added Hoodie Academy branding and posted it on Twitter - got 50+ retweets!
author: MemeLord

title: Hoodie Academy Banner Design
description: Designed a banner for our Discord server using the rule of thirds and golden ratio. Incorporated our project's lore elements - the hoodie character in the foreground with the city skyline in the background. Used complementary colors (purple/orange) for maximum impact.
author: DesignGuru

title: Custom Hoodie Traits Collection
description: Created 5 custom traits for our NFT collection: 1) Cyber Hoodie (rare), 2) Neon Glasses (uncommon), 3) Pixel Sword (legendary), 4) Retro Backpack (common), 5) Glitch Effect (epic). Each trait has 3-5 variations. Files are ready for minting!
author: TraitMaster
